thread.title: Peter Tiffin
thread.title_full: Ink Station reviewed by Peter Tiffin

author: Peter Tiffin
title: Peter Tiffin
text:
Ink Station was recommended by a friend. I found the web site very easy to navigate, and the ordering process straightforward. The goods ordered arrived very promptly.
I will definitely use again, and would recommend the company to anyone requiring inks in a hurry and at a good price.
